body.name: Camco Camper/RV Toilet Paper | Sewer-Safe, Septic-Safe & Biodegradable | Designed for Camper, Trailer & Marine Sanitation Systems | 1-Ply Tissue | 4 Toilet Paper Rolls – 280 Sheets per Roll (40275)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 13 mins
features: DESIGNED FOR RV/MARINE USE: Keep your system running reliably and smoothly with this specially engineered marine and RV toilet paper. This RV accessory is a camper must-have— add this great product to your camping supplies.
CLOG-RESISTANT: Say goodbye to those unexpected surprises! This rapid-dissolving toilet paper quickly flushes away without clogging, thanks to its fast-dissolving formula.
1-PLY PROTECTION: 1-ply toilet paper protection offers a soft, yet resilient feel— leaving you feeling confident and refreshed after every use.
SEPTIC SAFE TOILET PAPER: This biodegradable toilet paper is safe for septic tanks and is free from dyes or perfumes that might irritate sensitive skin.
QUANTITY: Keep yourself well-stocked with (4) toilet paper rolls; each roll contains 280 sheets. Don’t worry about running out of travel toilet paper during an exciting adventure!
body.description: Experience a superior clean thanks to Camco's TST 1-Ply RV and Marine Toilet Tissue, the perfect non-clogging toilet paper for RVs and boats. With its fast-dissolving formula that won't clog your systems, this bath tissue is sure to give you peace of mind while you enjoy your travels. Additionally, it is biodegradable and free from dyes or perfumes that could irritate sensitive skin, so you can feel confident using it, no matter where your adventures take you. This package comes with (4) rolls of bathroom tissue, 280 sheets each— plenty to keep you well-stocked on the go! Get the reliable cleanliness you need with the TST 1-ply camping toilet paper, an easy choice for any camper or boat owner!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Camco Manufacturing Our Brands: Our diverse flagship brands include: Rhino, TastePURE, Hydro Life, TST, Power Grip, Eaz-Lift, Life is Better at the Campsite, FasTen, Black Boar, Currituck, Kuuma, Olympian, TRAC, and Crooked Creek. Camco makes quality products for RVing, boating, camping, towing, tailgating, grilling and more. Our products help take your passion for the outdoors to the next level. At heart, Camco is a small company with big aspirations. Since 1966, we have earned a reputation for providing superior goods with high customer approval. We also work with inventors, entrepreneurs and small businesses to bring innovative products into the marketplace. At our core, we believe in manufacturing exceptional products and delivering superior service – all while providing a great customer experience. Our company headquarters is located in Greensboro, North Carolina. Camco also has numerous manufacturing facilities in the United States and around the globe. Explore your outdoor passion with Camco. Great memories are only an adventure away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toilet paper for RV backup
reviews.reviewText: Went camping and needed to have backup rolls, this one lasted longer than the ones provided by the RV rental company. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not high quality toilet paper but it is what you have to have for your campers septic system. It’s designed for that so it is what it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well for my Rv.
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised the rolls were smaller then the same ones I get in stores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: This tissue is very thin. Too thin for my tastes. It takes twice as much than with thicker brands, causing the rolls not to last as long. Probably won’t buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As good as you can get for RV TP!
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this for our first motorhome trip in our older motorhome. We thought we should get the items we've been told so we wouldn't have any issues; and, it worked....... no problems. I wouldn't say that it is particularly soft; but, I wasn't expecting it to be.We would definitely buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Works well, hubs said it broke down in the tank ok. A little pricey but If it helps save tank space, then I guess it is worth it. It is not the easiest thing to empty our boat porta potty, so less space taken up, the better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice TP
reviews.reviewText: Wasn’t sure about it because I’ve never ordered before I was surprised it’s actually a good size I would compare it to more of a Scott’s would for sure buy again.
Use with my RV - doesn't feel like cardboard on your bits.
I bought this for my joke Secret Santa gift for an RV trailer owner. Expensive for only four rolls but better for the septic system then regular toilet tissue!
They cleanup like any toilet paper does. Still cheaper to buy in store

I purchased two 4 Roll packages of this product at a cost of over $ 33.00. My order arrived quickly. I operate an environmental friendly toilet at my cottage to meet with the requirements of the law. The waste from the toilet enters a small masher to break up the toilet waste and then pump it into a septic tank where it will compost. I have bought 1 ply toilet paper locally that is just too thick causing the masher to jam which is a nasty job to clean out to enable it to run again. To solve this problem I spent the above amount of money to get marine 1 ply toilet paper. The rolls are very very small and of course thin. I have not used the product yet but I am sure it will complete the desired task. My complaint is, the minimum product you receive for the very high price. We are a captive market needing toilet paper such at this so the manufacturer over charges you for this thinner than normal toilet paper. My daughter picked up in the US a large package of 1 ply toilet paper (non marine) for a very low price. We just eventually ran out and ordered this over priced product. If possible, go to Walmart in the USA and purchase a large supply of 1 ply toilet paper to avoid the need for this Specialty Rip Off Toilet Paper…..
